text: Krzysztof Andzrej Bujar (born 14 November 1961) is a Polish former ice hockey player. He played for Naprzód Janów during his career. He also played for the Polish national team at the 1992 Winter Olympics and the 1989 World Championship. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:Naprzód Janów players Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Poland Category:Polish ice hockey forwards Category:Sportspeople from Katowice
title: Krzysztof Bujar
